column5: what about this new card to fish ontario. where do you get it?CoachTake a kid fishing!
Don't know where you got the $25 number from. It's $9 for three years.Try this:http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/en/Business...02_165323.html Nimstug
Yes, it is $9.00 and you apply for it when you get your fishing license, they will mail you a plastic card in the mail and it will be good for a total of three years.
Maybe he's talking about the new US Passport card. It's issued instead of a regular passport, but has restricted travel.

This card is kind of crazy when they could have just raised the price of a license by 3 dollars a year but it really is not that big a deal. We are in Canada now and just purchased licenses and cards on Saturday. It took us maybe an extra 30 minutes for the 12 of us to get the cards and licenses but it really was not that big a deal. I didn't want to pay the extra money or wait the extra time but what do you do. I am not staying home over a 9 dollar card. TonyO
Order Canadian Fishing License & Outdoor Card by phone: 800-667-1940
